channel.title: IRA on The Condition of the Republic
channel.description: Recent content in IRA on The Condition of the Republic

item.title: Documentaries about the Troubles
item.description: Most of these have been ripped off old VHS tapes which are themselves recordings of television broadcasts. The uploaders will have been conscientious enough to edit out the ad breaks, but sometimes they are left in. These are never quite as interesting as you expect them to be; none of them offer a very robust insight into the times in which they were broadcast, they are primarily noteworthy from the point of view of how orange television signals seemed to have been in the eighties and nineties.
